settings.question: What is Bottle Art?
settings.answer: Bottle Art specializes in handcrafted and customized bottle art. We transform ordinary bottles into extraordinary works of art, perfect for home decor, gifts, and special occasions.

settings.question: Where are you located?
settings.answer: We are an online-based company with our studio located in Montreal, Quebec. All orders are processed and shipped from this location.

settings.question: What types of bottles do you use for your art?
settings.answer: We use a variety of bottles, including alcohol bottles, wine bottles, beer bottles, and glass jars. Each bottle is carefully selected and cleaned before being transformed into a piece of art.

settings.question: Can I request a custom design?
settings.answer: Yes, we offer custom designs! You can provide us with your ideas, themes, or specific requests, and I will create a unique piece tailored to your specifications.

settings.question: How do I request a custom order?
settings.answer: To request a custom order, please visit our Customize Frames page and fill out the form with your details and design preferences. Our team will get in touch with you to finalize the design and provide a quote.

settings.question: How do I place an order?
settings.answer: You can place an order directly through our website. Simply browse our collection, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout.

settings.question: How long does it take to receive my order?
settings.answer: Standard orders typically take 5-7 business days to process and ship. Custom orders may take longer, depending on the complexity of the design. Delivery times vary based on your location.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: Please visit our return policy page

settings.question: How can I contact customer service?
settings.answer: You can reach our customer service team via email at [email address] or through our Contact Us page. We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.

settings.question: Do you have a physical store I can visit?
settings.answer: Currently, we operate exclusively online. However, we do participate in various art fairs and markets. Follow us on social media or sign up for our newsletter to stay updated on our events.
